story_99_00604/2401_1001_0100_10:
I see you’ve acquired the symbol of unity—the
Harmony Badge!
story_99_00604/2401_1001_0200_10:
Just one badge left to go. A Trainer of your
caliber should have no problem making it to
the tournament matches.
story_99_00604/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’ll be waiting to battle you in the
Champion Stadium!
